route_desc: Trains operate weekday rush hours only. During weekday rush hours, J and Z trains provide skip-stop service. Skip-stop service means that some stations are served by J trains, some stations are served by the Z trains, and some stations are served by both J and Z trains. J/Z skip-stop service runs towards Manhattan from about 7 AM to 8:15 AM and from Manhattan from about 4:30 PM to 5:45 PM.
